attributes.action: Use and/or buy fully furnished properties for mp's so that they do not have to claim for a second home in London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why can they not do the same as service personel do?  Let them live rent free if need be but there is no need for any of them to ever have to claim for any household item. The only claim should be for London allowance, i.e travel expenses.  Once their term in office is over then the property (which remains in the hands of the Government) will be passed onto the next individual who is in office.  If the services can do it then surely it must be easier for the government to do it, a much smaller number

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
